page.title: 20General Conclusion
page.content: In conclusion I would like to thank all the children of Upper Sixth and Form Six for their help in the Domesday Survey. To Mr. Rooker for the photographs, the Evans family for our visit to Northfield Farm, the Vicar for showing us around St. Oswald's Church, Shipton, to the owner of the Forgmill Hotel for his cooperation and Mrs. Unwin and the children involved in the computer inputting. Today the village of Shipton continues to grow in size. No longer is the village self-supporting as it was in the 1920'S when the villagers lived and worked locally, mainly on the land. Nowadays with the mechanisation of farming and increasing industrialisation the people of Shipton seek their livelihoods in the near by towns and cities.
